channel.title: Throughput Counter
channel.description:
Here's my first mod that displays the number of items passing through it per minute :
https://ficsit.app/mod/EBmtX1itvNsyDb
![](upload://jBe09UXryHow3RgumhuoPT7nmXb.jpeg)
I'll try to make it look a bit more "in universe" by having an actual screen on it or using a hologram, but that's a first prototype ! Also it should work in multiplayer - but it needs extensive testing.

item.title: Throughput Counter
item.dc:creator: @Martin_Hughes Martin Hughes
item.description:
@Martin_Hughes wrote:

I love this mod, makes things a bit easier to calculate along the way.

was wondering if this could be done on fluids as well?

Maybe a future addition?

Read full topic

item.title: Throughput Counter
item.dc:creator: @isochronous Isochronous
item.description:
@isochronous wrote:

I absolutely love this, but the one thing that drives me crazy is that it’s just a tiny bit shorter than a regular-height conveyor pole, so that when I connect it up the belts are ever so slightly ramped down. This triggers my OCD tendencies terribly.

It would also be great to be able to snap them to existing conveyors, and to have two versions, one with the numbers facing input, and one with the numbers facing the output.

Read full topic
